descript.abstract: Parking Beats. The dataset contains Department of Public Works Parking Beats, created as part of the DC Geographic Information System (DC GIS) for the D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO) and participating D.C. government agencies. OCTO staff, in consultation with DPW, heads-up digitized the routes, with the SIS street centerlines as a background, utilizing source maps and staff resources. All DC GIS data is stored and exported in Maryland State Plane coordinates NAD 83 meters. METADATA CONTENT IS IN PROCESS OF VALIDATION AND SUBJECT TO CHANGE. THIS IS FOR INTERNAL DC GOVERNMENT USE ONLY.
descript.purpose: This data is used for the planning and management of Washington, D.C. by local government agencies.

cntorgp.cntorg: D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.1.0.780

attracc.attraccr: Data believed to be complete and accurate, subject to change. Digital version compared with original source data for accuracy and completeness. Validated by source and/or responsible agency.

dataqual.logic: Validated by source and/or responsible agency.
dataqual.complete: Data believed to be complete and accurate, subject to change. Digital version compared with original source data for accuracy and completeness. Validated by source and/or responsible agency.

horizpa.horizpar: In process of validation by source and/or responsible agency.

vertacc.vertaccr: In process of validation by source and/or responsible agency.

procstep.procdesc: Staff consulted with Parking Beat contacts at OCTO and DPW to ensure the accuracy and currency of the data. The data is current as of May 2005.

cntorgp.cntorg: Office of the Chief Technology Officer

procstep.procdesc: OCTO GIS staff heads-up digitized the Parking Enforcement Beats using the SIS street centerlines as a backdrop. OCTO used internal source maps provided by DPW Parking Enforcement and staff resources to compile the routes. A polygon shapefile was created through this process in the ArcGIS environment. All DC GIS data is stored and exported in Maryland State Plane coordinates NAD 83 meters.

cntorgp.cntorg: D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer

procstep.procdesc: DC updated parking beats to follow the 2013 single member district lined (SMD). Staff used the smd value as the parking beat id.

attr.attrdef: DC Ward Identfier Parking Beat is in

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
